EmailTemplate.name: Div SF Eligible Not Fulfilled
EmailTemplate.subject: Wevorce transition reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LegalZoom.com
View online
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We're following up to make sure you're aware we are no longer offering divorce services in your area.
To proceed with your order, we've partnered with Wevorce to honor your LegalZoom purchase with no additional payment required. Wevorce is available to answer your questions and ensure a smooth transition. Email welcome@wevorce.com or call (855) 938-6723 x 1.
If you wish to cancel your order with us for any reason, give us a call at (800) 773-0888 Mon–Fri 5am to 7pm PT; Saturday 7am to 4pm PT to receive a full refund as part of our 60-day money-back guarantee. You can also email us at customercare@legalzoom.com.
We're here to help.
Your LegalZoom Team
Manage My Account | Explore Services Privacy Policy
Please do not reply to this message. This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: $EMAIL_ADDRESS_$
